Board Certified in PM&R

Compassionate and Personalized Care!

With over 15 years of extensive training and experience in Prolotherapy, Dr. Meyer is the ONLY Capital Region Physician offering a full-spectrum of Prolotherapy options. This non-surgical approach offers an extremely affordable, and more natural path to eliminating pain. Get back to enjoying activities and living a healthy, full life today!

Unsurpassed Skills:

A thorough history and physical exam

Expertise in diagnosing the cause and source of pain, injury, and decrease in abilities - even when standard tests have not been helpful

A biomechanical assessment determining factors contributing to the dysfunction

Individually designed treatement program and discussion of therapeutic options

Restoration to maximum activity without surgery


Proactive Approach:

Perhaps you though you just needed to accept certain problems, even though they negatively impacted your daily life

Dr. Meyer offers an alternative to using solely pain killers or receiving steroid injections which may merely be masking symptoms or put you at risk for future injury

Pain from arthritis, bursitis, tendonitis, disc problems, whiplash, nerve impingement, cartilage damage, fibromyalgia, strains, overuse injuries, chronic illness, etc. require a hands-on evaluation and often involve the entire kinetic chain

A foot problem may have originated from weakness in the hip and vice versa. The upper and lower core and even the way you breathe affects the neck and back. The shoulders and knees often take the brunt of overall deconditioning.


Are You a Candidate for Prolotherapy?

Exercize therapy addresses muscles and proper mechanics.

Hands-on soft-tissue work, other therapeutic modalities, as well as exercise prepare the body for return to activity

Orthotics can add needed support to the foot to improve gait and alignment

Prolotherapy can repair the damaged tissue that causes pain

It heals the injured tissues in and around the joints (i.e. in the knee or the spine). It strengthens ligaments and tendons and takes away pain. It involves the injection of a safe solution causing a natural local reaction, which increases blood supply and flow of nutrients and stimulates tissue repair. It is less traumatic to the body than arthroscopic, microscopic or open surgery and there is no down time or months of recovery.

It is also very affordable.


Techniques

After understanding your unique neuro-musculoskeletal system Dr. Meyer will help you retrain to achieve a higher level of function

Together you will consider prolotherapy to facilitate healing and tissue regeneration

Testimonials

Pastor Chris Gerardi

"When I fist saw Dr. Meyer, I could barely make it up the stairs to her office at the time. I had a constant pain down the front of my shin. I was desperate for help. I was upset because I couldn't even walk onto the field and watch my grandson's Little League games. Dr. M and Prolotherapy changed my life! Now I walk comfortably and move freely. And, I know where to go for help when I need it."

Z. Shafer

"My experience with Joy Meyer has been exceptional. Her ability to know exactly what my injury is and know exactly how to treat it is amazing! Within a short period of time doing her recommended excercises and checkups, I am back on my feet and free of injury!"

H.S. Champion Runner, Courtney Tedeschi

"I was struggling with a sever case of Plantar Fasciitis for many months until the tendon finally gave out and tore. I went from being frustrated, running in pain every day, to running pain-free! If my foot acts up again - I will definitely be back for some Prolo!"

College of St. Rose Star Runner, Macky Lloyd

"Dr. Meyer is a very focused doctor with a completely different perspective. She analyzes your problem from a physical function standpoint. I have seen her for my back and knee. The combination of rethinking of how to use my body, how to strengthen those muscles I should be using and don't, and prolotherapy has given me tremendous relief to my back. My knee pain diminished thanks to prolo. It took more time but I decided against the knee surgery and I'm glad I did."

Bob Balcom

"Great doctor! The only doctor that helped me after 10 years of searching for someone for back and hip problem. Prolotherapy worked for me."
